page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: There are 2 churches in this block, both belonging to the Church Of England anyone wishing to worship in a church of another denomination has to travel. there are Methodist Churches at Hopton, Botesdale, & Redgrave. At Botesdale & Hopton there are Gospel Hall meeting houses, and at Wattisfield a United Reformed Church. For other churches one must travel at least as far as Diss. The 2 parish churches of Hinderclay and Thelnetham are in the charge of one Rector, who also has charge of the parishes of Wattisfield and Hepworth. Both churches have parts dating back to the 13th Century, with additions through the years including some stained-glass windows in Hinderclay Church installed during the 1970s.
